divs: Sighting DetailsMy brother was camping out high up in the mountains. They noticed the lights in the sjy come out of no where. The light seemed as though they were flasing at them so they flashed back. He got a very good look but poor pictures, they move so fast. They actuly got very nervous maybe scared. He really does not want ot talk to anyone about it but her are some pics he sent me.
Summary: bright fast lights. They made a triangle, then a stright line then a circle after we falsed light at them
